title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Learning Through STEM-Based Educational Video Games

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze visual representations in educational video games to verbally explain STEM concepts
Learners can write and present project reports based on in-game simulation data
Learners can develop instructional design plans reflecting game-based learning experiences through peer evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
